io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.snapshot

Class SnapshotWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.snapshot.SnapshotWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferOutput<SnapshotWriter>, AutoCloseable

    public class SnapshotWriter
extends Object
implements BufferOutput<SnapshotWriter>
    Writes bytes to a state machine Snapshot.

    This class provides the primary interface for writing snapshot buffers to disk or memory. Snapshot bytes are written to an underlying Buffer which is backed by either memory or disk based on the configured StorageLevel.

    In addition to standard BufferOutput methods, snapshot readers support writing serializable objects to the snapshot via the BufferOutput.writeObject(Object, java.util.function.Function) method. Serializable types must be registered on the RaftServer serializer to be supported in snapshots.
